org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons
[Java] Interface GrailsClass

org.codehaus.groovy.grails.commons.GrailsClass
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.support.aware.GrailsApplicationAware
All Superinterfaces:
GrailsApplicationAware
public interface GrailsClass
extends GrailsApplicationAware

Represents any class in a Grails application.

Authors:
Steven Devijver
Graeme Rocher
Since:
0.1
